segments.text: Can you tell me if there is a flight to New York ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . Flight DB117 departs at 5:38 pm and arrives in New York at 6:00 am with a layover in Chicago . It also makes a refueling stop at Colombia .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: So many stops ! Don't you have any direct flights ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sorry sir , it is the only flight wa have right now .
segments.speaker: S2
